testing_instructions.usage: Copy and paste sections of this JSON into the PII Detection tool to test various scenarios
pii_types_included: Full names (John Anderson, Maria Rodriguez, etc.)
Credit card numbers (various card types and formats)
Dates (multiple formats: MM/DD/YYYY, Month DD, YYYY, YYYY-MM-DD)
test_recommendations: Try copy-pasting entire scenarios to test bulk processing
Test different encryption methods on the same data
Verify that all PII types are properly detected and highlighted
Test the toggle functionality by disabling certain PII types

data_statistics.pii_instances: 100+ individual PII data points for comprehensive testing
